PHRASE.LANG: Scary Fairy is one twisted sister Peep! As your Companion Peep, she will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Scary Fairy est une vraie nana tordue. Comme ta Compagne Peep, elle va te suivre partout et va être ta meilleure copine.[#Legal]
Scary Fairy ist ein verrücktes und verdrehtes Peep! Als dein Freundschats-Peep wird sie dir zu Hause überall hin folgen und ist deine beste Freundin![#Legal]
Scary Fairy é un Peep pazzarello! Come il tuo Companion Peep, ti seguirá dentro in Casa é diventerá il tuo migliore amico.[#Legal]
Scary Fairy es el Peep loco de la esquina! Como tu Companion Peep, te seguirá a tu Casa y será tu mejor cuate.[#Legal]
Scary Fairy는 심술쟁이 Peep이랍니다! 컴패니언 Peep으로 온 집안을 졸졸 따라다니며 당신의 가장 친한 친구가 되고 싶어합니다. [#Legal]
Scary Fairy is one twisted sister Peep! As your Companion Peep, she will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Scary Fairy是瘋狂的Peep小姐！作為隨身夥伴Peep，她會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Scary Fairy是瘋狂的Peep小姐！作為隨身夥伴Peep，她會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Scary Fairy is one twisted sister Peep! As your Companion Peep, she will follow you throughout Home and will be your best buddy.[#Legal]
